websocket::async_teardown

Start tearing down a connection. 

template<
    class Socket,
    class TeardownHandler>
void
async_teardown(
    role_type role,
    Socket& socket,
    TeardownHandler&& handler);

    class Executor,
    class TeardownHandler>
void

    role_type role,
    net::basic_stream_socket< Protocol, Executor >& socket,
